subject: What do you use?
author: usmcmacswife
full_text:
What brand of recorders do each one of you use to record EVP's or when you speak to someone with a ghost box?

We are looking at changing our recorder. The one we want to go with it no longer being made..
We'd like to find one that is compatible with MAC and Windows Computers.

Your response and input as to why you like it, love it or hate it would be deeply appreciated!!!
We don't want to jut go out buy one and hate it again!!!

Thank you in advance!!!
